subject: Racewalking
Olympic Games (2012)
Television
Instant Replay (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The sight of racewalkers apparently flouting the rules can lead to howls from the public and the news media, with calls for racewalking to be thrown out of the Olympics.
snippet: The sight of racewalkers apparently flouting the rules can lead to howls from the public and the news media, with calls for racewalking to be thrown out of the Olympics.
